blogPost.title: Is it possible to have a work-life balance and also a productive workflow? Answer by Jack Simms with HomeValet. https://t.co/COON3miF8e https://t.co/1vRk6Gdc3R
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ワークライフバランスを保ちつつ、生産性の高いワークフローを実現することは可能でしょうか？HomeValet社のJack Simms氏による回答です。https://t.co/COON3miF8e https://t.co/1vRk6Gdc3R
是否有可能在工作与生活之间取得平衡，同时又有一个富有成效的工作流程？由HomeValet的Jack Simms回答。https://t.co/COON3miF8e https://t.co/1vRk6Gdc3R
是否有可能在工作與生活之間取得平衡，同時又有一個富有成效的工作流程？由HomeValet的Jack Simms回答。https://t.co/COON3miF8e https://t.co/1vRk6Gdc3R

next.title: What are the first five things a company should do before launching? Answer by @eytanbensoussan, Co-Founder of @northonebanking. https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P

localize.full_text: 会社が立ち上げる前に最初にすべき5つのこととは？answer by @eytanbensoussan, Co-Founder of @northonebanking. https://t.co/zhmEiS55pp https://t.co/DKYXLAzq9P
